label: UBOS
tag line: Linux distro for personal servers and Indie IoT devices
Description1: Makes administration of user-owned servers much simpler
Description2: Want to keep your data at home instead of handing it over to a cloud overlord? But dreading server maintenance. UBOS makes it simple.
description:
#Linux distro for personal servers and Indie IoT devices
##About UBOS
![About UBOS](https://www.youtube.com/embed/6Z22c8vGzD4)
 ###Makes administration of user-owned servers much simpler
Want to keep your data at home instead of handing it over to a cloud overlord? But dreading server maintenance. UBOS makes it simple.
